# <a name="how-to-remove-autogenerated-columns-from-a-windows-forms-datagridview-control"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7aff-102">Porady: usuwanie utworzonych automatycznie kolumn z formantu DataGridView formularzy systemu Windows</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-102">How to: Remove Autogenerated Columns from a Windows Forms DataGridView Control</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="a7aff-103">Jeśli Twoje <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> formantu jest ustawiona na automatyczne generowanie kolumn na podstawie danych z źródła danych, można selektywnie pominąć niektóre kolumny.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-103">When your <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is set to autogenerate its columns based on data from its data source, you can selectively omit certain columns.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-104">Można to zrobić przez wywołanie metody <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metoda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> kolekcji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-104">You can do this by calling the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-105">Alternatywnie można ukryć kolumny w widoku, ustawiając <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> właściwości `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-105">Alternatively, you can hide columns from view by setting the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-106">Ta technika jest przydatne, jeśli chcesz wyświetlić ukryte kolumny w niektórych warunkach lub gdy chcesz uzyskać dostęp do danych w kolumnach bez ich wyświetlania.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-106">This technique is useful when you want to display the hidden columns in certain conditions, or when you need to access the data in the columns without displaying it.</span></span>  
  
### <a name="to-remove-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7aff-107">Aby usunąć utworzonych automatycznie kolumn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-107">To remove autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-108">Wywołanie <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> metoda <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> kolekcji.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-108">Call the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumnCollection.Remove%2A> method on the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.Columns%2A> collection.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](../../../../samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#111)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#111](../../../../samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#111)]  
  
### <a name="to-hide-autogenerated-columns"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7aff-109">Aby ukryć utworzonych automatycznie kolumn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-109">To hide autogenerated columns</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-110">Wartość w kolumnie <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> właściwości `false`.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-110">Set the column's <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewColumn.Visible%2A> property to `false`.</span></span>  
  
     [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](../../../../samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#112)]
     [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#112](../../../../samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#112)]

## <a name="compiling-the-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="a7aff-112">Kompilowanie kodu</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-112">Compiling the Code</span></span>  
 <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-113">Ten przykład wymaga:</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-113">This example requires:</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> formantu o nazwie `dataGridView1` powiązana z tabelą, który zawiera `Fax` i `CustomerID` kolumn, takich jak `Customers` tabeli w bazie danych Northwind.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-114">A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control named `dataGridView1` bound to a table that contains `Fax` and `CustomerID` columns, such as the `Customers` table in the Northwind sample database.</span></span>  
  
-   <span data-ttu-id="a7aff-115">Odwołuje się do <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> i <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> zestawów.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="a7aff-115">References to the <xref:System?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms?displayProperty=nameWithType> assemblies.</span></span>
